description: This skill helps you to get Spanish translations for your English words or sentences. Use this skill to learn Spanish quickly. Whether it is simple words or large sentences, Spanish Tutor gets your Spanish translation done in seconds.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask spanish tutor what is hello
Alexa, ask spanish tutor what is good morning
Alexa, ask spanish tutor to translate i am going to cancun
name: Spanish Tutor
shortDescription: This skill helps you to get Spanish translations for your English words or sentences.
